abstract: Pres Obama signs annual National Defense Authorization Act, despite provisions it contains will continue to hinder his plans to close military prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba; Obama's signing statement suggests provisions may be unconstitutional and not necessarily binding.
lead_paragraph: The president said he still believed that provisions in the defense policy bill making it harder for him to close the prison in Cuba might be unconstitutional and not necessarily binding.

headline.main: Obama Signs Defense Bill, Despite Guantánamo Objections
headline.print_headline: Obama Signs Defense Bill, Despite Flaws

snippet: The president said he still believed that provisions in the defense policy bill making it harder for him to close the prison in Cuba might be unconstitutional and not necessarily binding.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
